name: Campfire (OliverNural)
description:
Note: For the best experience, download the game!


This is my first game I've created and released, all assets and sounds were made by me (excluding the fire and snow sound).

I hope you enjoy, and please leave any feedback below! :)

Campfire

You're lost on a mountain, it's freezing cold
You have a lantern to keep you warm and lit
You need to find your way back to your Campfire.

Controls
WASD - Movement

Tools

  • Game Engine -Godot
  • Text Editor - Visual Studio Code
  • Graphics - Aseprite
  • Music - Audacity
